select a.UID, a.accountname, a.qq, c.cera, b.cera_point from d_taiwan.accounts as a inner join taiwan_billing.cash_cera as c on a.UID = c.account inner join taiwan_billing.cash_cera_point as b on a.UID = b.account
and a.accountname = #{accountname}

SELECT a.m_id, date_format( a.last_login_date, '%Y-%c-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS last_login_date, a.login_ip, a.m_channel_no, b.accountname, c.charac_no, d.job, d.lev, d.grow_type, CONVERT ( unhex( hex( CONVERT (`charac_name` USING latin1) ) ) USING utf8 ) AS charac_name FROM taiwan_login.login_account_3 AS a INNER JOIN d_taiwan.accounts AS b ON a.m_id = b.uid INNER JOIN taiwan_game_event.event_1306_account_reward AS c ON a.m_id = c.m_id INNER JOIN taiwan_cain.charac_info AS d ON c.charac_no = d.charac_no WHERE a.login_status = 1

SELECT a.m_id, date_format( a.last_login_date, '%Y-%c-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS last_login_date, a.login_ip, a.m_channel_no, b.accountname, d.charac_no, d.job, d.lev, d.grow_type, CONVERT ( unhex( hex( CONVERT (`charac_name` USING latin1) ) ) USING utf8 ) AS charac_name FROM taiwan_login.login_account_3 AS a INNER JOIN d_taiwan.accounts AS b ON a.m_id = b.uid INNER JOIN taiwan_cain.charac_info AS d ON a.m_id = d.m_id
